  • Method Details

    • load

      Optional<Publication> load(Long id) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Load @Publication by id.
      Parameters:
      id - id as primary for the publication
      Returns:
      optionally an publication if found
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if argument is illegal

    • create

      void create(Publication publication) throws PersistException
      Create a new publication.
      Parameters:
      publication - new unmanaged publication
      Throws:
      PersistException - if entity exists, argument is illegal or transaction is required

      Publication update(Publication publication) throws PersistException
      Update an existing Publication.
      Parameters:
      publication - managed entity
      Returns:
      updated managed publication
      Throws:
      PersistException - if argument is illegal or transaction is required

    • delete

      void delete(Long id) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Delete an existing publication by id
      Parameters:
      id - primary key
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if there is no publication with this id

      List<Publication> findAll()
      List all Publication
      Returns:
